text: @10DowningStreet @BorisJohnson Two children in a Liverpool school have coronavirus,so they can and do catch it they can’t all be shoved back to school because of some poor children who are known to suffer abuse and violence ,by all means send them back ,but others whose parents don’t feel it’s safe should not.
